text: Sledge-Hayley House is a historic home located at Warrenton, Warren County, North Carolina. It was built between 1852 and 1855, and is a two-story, three bay, Greek Revival style rectangular frame dwelling. It has a hipped roof with deep overhang and sits on a brick basement. The front facade has a one-bay entrance porch supported by two unfluted Doric order columns. It was listed on the National Register of Historic Places in 1980. ==References== Category:Houses on the National Register of Historic Places in North Carolina Category:Greek Revival houses in North Carolina Category:Houses completed in 1855 Category:Houses in Warren County, North Carolina Category:National Register of Historic Places in Warren County, North Carolina
title: Sledge-Hayley House
